import React, {useState} from "react"; import Button from "../button/button.jsx"; import styles from "./checkbox-from.module.scss"; function CheckboxForm (props) { const [email, setEmailChecked] = useState(false); const [notifications, setNotificationsChecked] = useState(true); const [messages, setMessagesChecked] = useState(true); const [calls, setCallsChecked] = useState(true); return (
